subject: hmmmm, the boxes?
author: Frank Sumption
full_text:
Got this tonight via EVPmaker. I'm not so sure the boxes are all that
useful. Maybe they let too much through.  Compared to the box, EVPmaker is
prefectly clear. Note the use of human speech for the raw audio.

Frank-S
